Parameters: PublishConfig: The new discovery publish session configuration (@B_android#net#wifi#aware#PublishConfig_E@). This value must never be null.
updatePublish(android.net.wifi.aware.Pub.Description: Re-configure the currently active publish session. The @B_android#net#wifi#aware#DiscoverySessionCallback_E@ is not replaced - the same listener used at creation is still used. The results of the configuration are returned using @B_android#net#wifi#aware#DiscoverySessionCallback_E@: @B_android#net#wifi#aware#DiscoverySessionCallback#onSessionConfigUpdated_E@: configuration update succeeded. @B_android#net#wifi#aware#DiscoverySessionCallback#onSessionConfigFailed_E@: configuration update failed. The publish discovery session is still running using its previous configuration (i.e. update failure does not terminate the session).

ClassDesc: A class representing a Aware publish session. Created when @B_android#net#wifi#aware#WifiAwareSession#publish_E@ is called and a discovery session is created and returned in @B_android#net#wifi#aware#DiscoverySessionCallback#onPublishStarted_E@. See baseline functionality of all discovery sessions in @B_android#net#wifi#aware#DiscoverySession_E@. This object allows updating an existing/running publish discovery session using @B_android#net#wifi#aware#PublishDiscoverySession#updatePublish_E@.
